summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3823 for the improvement of North 83rd Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to a point approximately 200 feet west of Aurora Avenue; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 46959, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
